snippet: SCHWARTZ--Dr. Edith. The Institute for Psychoanalytic Training and Research mourns the death of Dr. Edith Schwartz. She was a beloved teacher, training analyst and supervisor, with a unique blend of the playful and practical in analytic work. She will be greatly missed. 1/3
lead_paragraph: SCHWARTZ--Dr. Edith. The Institute for Psychoanalytic Training and Research mourns the death of Dr. Edith Schwartz. She was a beloved teacher, training analyst and supervisor, with a unique blend of the playful and practical in analytic work. She will be greatly missed. 1/3
